title: End of Game replays or at the least Highlights. Please and thankyou.
body: As the title Suggests, I can understand that storing replays would take an immense amount of space to keep, at least if they were available to download for an hour after game-play if requested otherwise deleted.

replies.body: WHY AREN'T WE FUNDING THIS?!?!! Riot there is a market for this! Other Lolreplay programs aren't great but are good enough for the desperate people! Being able to have a replay and upload it is what makes xbox one great!
